message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early.
I'm willing to compromise, but I want a slightly bigger share. Let's see if you'll accept this offer.
Not a good deal, Bob. I'd rather wait for a better offer.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need a better share to make it worth my while.
I'm getting closer to your proposal, but I still think I deserve a slightly bigger share. Let's see if you'll meet me in the middle.
Alright, Bob, you've convinced me. Let's split it 50-50.
